name: 2025 10th International Conference on Building Materials and Construction
content: Publication: All full paper submissions will be blind reviewed on the basis of technical quality, relevance to conference topics of interest, originality, significance, and presentation. Accepted papers will be published into Lecture Notes in Civil Engineering (ISSN: 2366-2557) as a proceedings book volume. Springer will conduct quality checks on the accepted papers and only papers that pass these checks will be published. The book series will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus. All books published in the series are submitted for consideration in Web of Science.
